persona.name: Overwhelmed Modern Mother
persona.notes: A mother juggling work, parenting and societal expectations, frequently experiencing guilt, burnout and pressure to perform at unattainable standards. Likely between the ages of 30â€“45, she is introspective, intent on doing what's best for her children, yet often lacks adequate support.

milestone.title: Dismantling the 'Supermom' Myth
milestone.theme: Challenging societal and internalised parenting ideals
